parameters.name: ArtifactBuildProperty
parameters.description: The build properties of the artifact, utilized for hosting and building the deployment package.

parameters.name: ArtifactBuildType
parameters.description:
The type of the artifact build task. Valid values:

- EcsImage: Build ECS (Elastic Container Service) image.

- Dockerfile: Build container image based on Dockerfile.

- Buildpacks: Build container image based on Buildpacks.

- ContainerImage: Rebuild container image by renaming an existing container image.

parameters.name: ArtifactId
parameters.description: The ID of the deployment package.

parameters.name: ArtifactProperty
parameters.description: The properties of the deployment object.

parameters.name: ArtifactType
parameters.description:
The type of the deployment package. Valid values:

*   EcsImage: Elastic Compute Service (ECS) image.
*   AcrImage: container image.
*   File: Object Storage Service (OSS) object.
*   Script: script.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the deployment package.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the deployment package.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: VersionName
parameters.description: The version name of the deployment package.
